message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm asking for $22,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I'm really interested in the product, but $22,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $18,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to be within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While $22,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $20,000. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $20,000, but I'm still a bit stretched. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering $19,000. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial price.
